title: EU Fines Musk's X $140 Million For Violating Hate Speech, Misinformation Rules
description: The penalty is the first major enforcement action under the EU's Digital Services Act (DSA), a sweeping law designed to hold large tech platforms accountable for harmful and illegal content.
content: The European Union has issued a $140 million fine against X, the social-media platform owned by Elon Musk, after investigators concluded that the company repeatedly violated the bloc's strict rules o… [+2585 chars]
